Load and augment coral polyp density data

polyp_density_data.Rd

Loads polyp_density.csv, adds an estimated entry for Acropora millepora based on similar species (A. nasuta and A. spathulata), and assigns growthform classifications.

Usage

polyp_density_data

Format

An object of class data.frame with 45 rows and 7 columns.

Value

A polyp_density_data data frame with all species and assigned growthforms.

Details

  • Acropora millepora is not present in the original dataset.

  • To estimate it, data for A. nasuta and A. spathulata are duplicated and relabeled.

  • A new spp code "AM" is assigned to the added entries.

  • Growthforms are recoded using fct_recode() based on species name.

Examples

head(polyp_density_data)
#>         id spp              species cm2 polyps polyps_cm2 growthform
#> 1      764  AC    Acropora cytherea  16   1268    79.2500    Tabular
#> 2      663  AH  Acropora hyacinthus  16   1355    84.6875    Tabular
#> 3      719  AH  Acropora hyacinthus  16   1212    75.7500    Tabular
#> 4 large G.  GP Goniastrea pectinata  16     90     5.6250    Massive
#> 5      769  GP Goniastrea pectinata  16     57     3.5625    Massive
#> 6      733  GP Goniastrea pectinata  16    112     7.0000    Massive
